        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078298">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078298">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078298">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078298" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078299">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078299">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078299">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078299">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078299" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078303">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078303">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078303">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate websites with varying viewpoints on my topic--that are not news sites?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078303">
          <div id="boxatt17078303" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130414">
              <a id="link_20130414" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130414,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130425">
              <a id="link_20130425" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130425,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Bibliography can be useful as a guide to varied websites on a topic.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078300">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078300">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078300">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate news articles on my topic?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078300">
          <div id="boxatt17078300" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130432">
              <a id="link_20130432" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130432,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286581}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for magazines such as Newsweek, Time, and People.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130437">
              <a id="link_20130437" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130437,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News archive (newspaper, newswires, and news transcripts), updated daily, from around the world. Includes New York Times, London Times, and selected Middle Eastern sources published in English. Includes many local papers as well.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078302">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078302">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078302">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly articles on my topic?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078302">
          <div id="boxatt17078302" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130483">
              <a id="link_20130483" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5BSX" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130483,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716850}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Published by an academic press. Available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130504">
              Encyclopaedia of the Qur'¯an
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trexler Library Reference 297.12203 E56o
               <br />
               Academic press.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130511">
              <a id="link_20130511" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxfordreference.com/view/10.1093/acref/9780195305135.001.0001/acref-9780195305135" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130511,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20130511}); ">
               Oxford Encyclopedia of the Islamic World
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Academic press.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130410">
              <a id="link_20130410" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130410,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Limit to "peer reviewed" or "academic journals" to get at the scholarly journals.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130413">
              <a id="link_20130413" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130413,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Specific to religion studies. Use caution here: not all sources included here are scholarly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130411">
              <a id="link_20130411" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130411,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130517">
              <a id="link_20130517" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://online.sagepub.com/cgi/search" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130517,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618708}); ">
               Sage Journals Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               All full text. All academic. Covers many of the social sciences including studies of popular culture.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078301">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078301">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078301">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly books on my topic?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078301">
          <div id="boxatt17078301" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130409">
              <a id="link_20130409" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130409,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Use in conjunction with interlibrary loan to acquire the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130408">
              <a id="link_20130408" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130408,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Use in conjunction with interlibrary loan to acquire the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078420">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078420">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078420">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Is there resource to help in discerning the politics of a given periodical?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078420">
          <div id="boxatt17078420" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130550">
              <a id="link_20130550" href="http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130550,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Islam in America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974165}); ">
               UlrichsWeb Periodicals Directory
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This resource reviews most periodicals and may include a statement on political orientation or other bias.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4642549" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078304">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078304">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078304">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources and compiling an annotated bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078304">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For help in writing annotated bibliographies, visit Purdue's
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
            Online Writing Lab
           </a>
           for a
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/general/gl_annotatedbib.html">
            definition
           </a>
           of an annotation and
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
            samples
           </a>
           using APA and MLA styles.
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
           Writing a source review:
          </p>
          <p>
           One strategy for writing a source review is to think of it as an amplified annotation, employing the organization described
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/01/">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078304" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078305">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078305">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078305">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078305">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078305" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
